title: Zoe Market and Food - Via Giulia
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, International, Organic, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out
description: Vegetarian market/cafe is the little sister of Zoe Food on Via Felice Venezian, but with NO meat. Juices, bagels, smoothies, super foods, gluten free lunches with quinoa, buckwheat, soups, salads. Located in a renovated 1940's food market, tall shelves of all organic products surround the 5 tables inside and a children's area. Mostly vegan with a wide range of vegetable milks available: millet, soy, rice, almond, quinoa, oat.
